mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM `team` NATURAL JOIN `team_member` WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, username, email, realname as real_name, user_perm FROM `user` AS u JOIN `team_member` AS t WHERE u.uid = t.user_id AND team_id = #{teamId}
SELECT * FROM `user_team` u JOIN `team` t ON u.team_id = t.team_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY lastViewedTime DESC LIMIT 0, 10
